name: Aqua Chamber
description:
Enjoy my little fluid simulation which is leaned to the Dwarf Fortress Water 'Physics'.

You may select different Cells and change their Properties or add new Cells to the simulation in order to create complex simulation scenes.

DimNet: The 'Dimensional Network' can be used to switch the state of different Cells (i.e. open and close Doors). There is only the Editor Scene with a preload sample which presents most of the features.

This is a Game Jam Entry for the GDFG Game Jam #5.
https://itch.io/jam/gdfgs-monthly-game-jam-5

Theme: This is Only A Test

If the web version does not load, consider downloading the executable.

Thank you for playing <3

Credits: Music by/created with MuseNet
